domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: With Man in Room 301, dive into the dark secrets of the Kurtti family. When lies and tragedies resurface, the life of this seemingly close-knit family turns into chaos. A surprising thriller that will make your long-haul flight almost too short. https://t.co/0dskVOee6R
A long-haul flight with Air France and CANNESERIES is also Cheyenne & Lola, an adventure between friendship, dangerous game and duplicity. https://t.co/ifHufPG4ts

When an argument breaks out between a civics teacher and his student, both have no idea how much this political conflict will change their lives. Enjoy a long-haul flight with "The Lesson," the CANNESERIES Best Series winner in 2022. https://t.co/OAPGigV2i9

For all series fans, Air France turns a long-haul flight into a real pleasure. From August 1 to September 30, discover the series presented at the fifth edition of CANNESERIES. https://t.co/nf1xoK8EE6
@CynthiaHijar Hola @CynthiaHijar, hemos respondido a tu requerimiento a través de mensaje directo. Estaremos a tu disposición mediante la misma vía si requieres información adicional. Saludos.

@PaulinaGPascale Hola @PaulinaGPascale, gracias por contactarnos por este medio. Si necesitas asistencia, por favor escríbenos a través de mensaje interno, indicando tu información de viaje y requerimiento. Saludos.
RT @AFnewsroom: He operates before takeoff for your comfort and safety: the #AirFrance cabin technician. Ready to discover the backstage of…

@Giulia_Sammarco Hello @Giulia_Sammarco, 
We are really sorry to learn that. Could you please send us a DM with as much info as possible about what happened and include your reference number and full contact details ? Our customer service will go back to you as quickly as possible. Guillaume

data.text: @ayrastarr Hi , Celestial being. We regret to read about the baggage incident. Please let us know your Property Irregularity Report (PIR) reference number, similar to CDGAF12345 or your baggage tag number by DM only so that we can check the status of your file. Thank you.

data.text: @ayrastarr Hello, we are very sorry about this situation. Can you please contact us by DM so that an agent can assist you ? Thank you, Clémence.
@ZonteeHou Hello, we are very sorry for this situation. Can you please contact us by DM so that an agent can assist you ? Thank you, Clémence.
@ajaoxum Hello Aja, we are very sorry for this situation. If you need any assistance from our company, please contact us by DM so that an agent can assist you. Thank you, Clémence.
@ajaoxum Hello, we are very sorry for this situation. Can you please contact us by DM and ask for an agent ? One of my colleagues will be able to assist you. Thank you, Clémence.

urls.title: Equipaje extraviado o deteriorado | Air France
urls.description: ¿Su equipaje no aparece a la llegada del vuelo? Le rogamos aceptar nuestras disculpas y le aseguramos que hacemos todo lo posible por ayudarle. A continuación, le indicamos los trámites que deberá efectuar. El transporte del equipaje, especialmente si está demasiado lleno, puede ocasionar rayas, marcas y otros daños menores cuya responsabilidad no puede imputársenos.

data.text:
@quetecrees Hola Renzo,
Para obtener información sobre el estado de su equipaje, le invitamos a utilizar nuestra herramienta de localización en línea 👉https://t.co/m2KRiiNZiC . Haremos todo lo posible para entregar su equipaje lo antes posible. Le pedimos disculpas por las molestias.
@YannDarwin Bonjour Yann, comme demandé, nos collègues vous ont transmis par message privé le contact du service bagage de Munich. Nous restons à votre écoute. Merci, Clémence.

@YannDarwin Bonjour Yann, nous sommes sincèrement navrés pour cette situation. Pouvez-vous s'il vous plaît nous contacter en DM et demander un conseiller ? Un de mes collègues pourra ainsi vous assister au plus vite. Merci beaucoup, Clémence.

@Karito_C Hola Caro, gracias por tu mensaje.   Si tu solicitud implica una reserva de Air France, por favor comparte con nosotros tu código de reserva y nombre del pasajero.

Te esperamos.

@Saiarav Hello, Sai. This link is valid for 24 hours. Once payment has been made, you will receive a confirmation at the e-mail address provided in your booking. You can make your payment here: https://t.co/B0IDVxgCeN. We remain available
@thatmexaguy Hello, we are very sorry for this situation. We invite you to contact us in DM so that an agent can assist you. Thank you, Clémence.
@SoniaNarang18 Hello Sonia, we are very sorry for the delay. We invite you to contact us by DM so that an agent can assist you. We remain at your disposal. Have a nice day, Clémence.

@MarceloCourrege Hello,
We confirm you that the tracking tool doesn't allow you to consult a file older than 45 days but we assure you that the research continues well beyond that. Once the baggage is located and in the process of being shipped, you will be notified by email/text before delivery.

@skuterpl Hi, @SkuterPL. Thank you for reaching out to us. We kindly invite you to send us a DM so we can assist you accordingly. Please prepare your booking code or ticket number and the full name of the passenger on the booking. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@joseramonm Hello @joseramonm. We would like to advise you that claims are handled by the Customer Care Department. If your claim has already been submitted, you will be contacted directly, as soon as as it has been assessed. Please allow some time for this process to be fully completed.

urls.title: Bagage manquant ou endommagé | Air France
urls.description: Air France vous indique comment procéder si votre bagage ne vous a pas été restitué à l'aéroport d'arrivée. Vos bagages ont été endommagés au cours d'un vol ? Air France vous conseille et vous informe.

data.text: @CocoCastafiore Bjr @CocoCastafiore , nous sommes désolés pour cette situation. Nous vous invitons à utiliser uniquement notre outil de recherche de bagage en ligne : https://t.co/1KT2si7ydG. Nous mettons tout en œuvre afin de vous livrer votre bagage au plus vite. Bonne journée, Sandrine
@MaryMillben Hello Mary, it was a great pleasure to have you on board, we hope to see you again very soon. Have a great day ✈ Clémence.

@chinamoses Hello, we regret the reported incident with your luggage. Could you please provide our customer service department with your luggage tag number via DM so that they can inquire. Thank you, Karine

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: @LarkinPoe Hello again, our bag teams are mobilized to send your luggage back to Hamburg in the next hours. Thank you for your patience and sorry again for this delay. Karine

@silviakahn Hola Silvia, gracias por escribirnos y lamentamos la incidencia que mencionas. Ante cualquier situación acércate a nuestro personal para que te asistan. Si necesitas presentar un reclamo, indícanos por DM tu código de reserva para guiarte una vez termines tu vuelo. Saludos.

@LarkinPoe Hello, we regret the reported incident regarding the missing baggage. To assist you in the best possible way, could you please indicate your booking and baggage tag number by DM ? Thank you. Karine
@Ju_Concha Hola @Ju_Concha, gracias por contactarnos por este medio. Si necesitas asistencia, por favor escríbenos a través de mensaje interno, indicándonos tu información de viaje. Saludos.

@dansaprick Thank you for getting back to us, Dan! However, we regret that we are unable to inform you differently here on social media. We kindly suggest you to visit the link stated on our previous message. Please let us know if you have any other concern.

@adrienbarrillon Bonjour @adrienbarrillon, nous sommes navrés de l'expérience vécue par vos enfants et déplorons les faits évoqués. 
Vous pouvez nous en dire davantage en DM si vous souhaitez un accompagnement de notre service client. 
Nous restons à votre écoute. 
Sandrine

@kathor75 Nous sommes ravis que l'incident soit résolu. Nous vous souhaitons un très bon vol. 
Sandrine

data.text:
@robindbrant Hi @robindbrant, your DM will be taken care of in priority due to the waiting time of your luggage delivery. Our customer service team will contact you as soon as possible. 
Thank you. Sandrine
@PaulGrondahl Hello Paul, no worries, it's just the effect of the air conditioning. Have a great day ! Clémence.
@Goodlucklive Hello, we are very sorry about this situation. We invite you to contact us by DM so that an agent can assist you. Thank you, Clémence.
@SuttonBStracke Hello, we are very sorry for this situation. Can you please contact us by DM ? One of my colleagues will be able to assist you. Thank you, Clémence.
@robaad Hola, Robert. Gracias por comunicarte con nosotros por este medio. Comparte tu reservación por medio de DM con gusto te aclaramos tus dudas. Estaremos atentos
@DenisseROlivari Hello Denisse, we are very sorry for this situation. Can you please contact us by DM and ask for an agent ? One of my colleagues will be able to assist you. Thank you, Clémence.

Nous sommes sincèrement navrés de vous savoir déçue. Nous vous invitons à nous contacter en DM si vous avez besoin d'assistance. Un conseiller vous viendra en aide au plus vite. Nous restons à votre écoute. Christelle

urls.title: Animales | Air France
urls.description: Air France le detalla aquí las diferentes modalidades de transporte a adoptar para asegurar un viaje óptimo a su animal. Air France - El transporte de animales no esta incluído en el precio de su billete. Se deberá abonar una cantidad concertada en el aeropuerto. Esta cantidad variará en función de su destino. Algunos animales no están acceptados a bordo de un avión; descubre la reglamentación actual.

data.text: @ar_Gri Hola Arlette, es posible el transporte de tu perro en cabina, encuentras información en el siguiente enlace https://t.co/B8auNqIZTO, si compartes tu código de reservación vía DM podemos responder con mayor detalle, esperamos tu respuesta.

urls.title: Missing or damaged baggage | Air France
urls.description: Air France tells you the steps you need to take if your baggage was not returned to you. Your baggage was damaged during a flight? Air France advises you and keeps you up-to-date

data.text: @irfantracks We're sorry to hear this, Irfan. Our airport infrastructures are currently experiencing disruptions in the baggage system. For all procedures related to a baggage incident, kindly visit our website https://t.co/BGFwk1nO6N. Thanks for your patience and understanding.

@lismarybaby Hola Lisa y gracias por contactarnos por este medio. 
Lamentamos lo sucedido con tu equipaje.
Nos podrías enviar un DM con tu número PIR (seguimiento de maleta), así podremos darte la información completa. 
Saludos.
Karim ✈️

@aurekun7 Bonjour @aurekun7, votre DM concernant l'achat de votre siège a été pris en compte par les conseillers de clientèle. 
Une réponse vous sera apportée dès que possible. 
Merci de votre patience et bonne journée, 
Sandrine

@inma_omogo Hola Inma y gracias por escribirnos.
Lamentamos la demora.
Te invitamos enviarnos tu código de reserva en privado para que nuestros equipos del servicio de atención al cliente puedan darte mas información.
Saludos,
Karim ✈️

@mantismans Hello, we are sincerely sorry for this situation and we hear your dissatisfaction. However, we do not accept insults. We remain at your disposal by DM for assistance with your travel details.
Clémence.

@TiffanyHenne Bonjour @TiffanyHenne, suite à votre DM et considérant le délai de votre demande , un conseiller reviendra vers vous dans les plus brefs délais. 
Bonne journée, Sandrine

@senseidocdu Merci @senseidocdu pour votre message! Nous sommes ravis que nos vols avec vous racontent de si jolies histoires. Bonnes retrouvailles nippones🇯🇵
Sandrine

data.text: @dwayne_trip Thank you for contacting us, Dwayne. You can check our programs and offers on our website via this link https://t.co/BdDpYXRqrd. If you have further question, we remain available.

@thenickydoll Hello Nicky, we are very sorry for the delay. Due to the current high volume of requests, response times are being extended. Can you please contact us by DM with your booking reference ? An agent will be able to assist you. Thank you, Clémence.

data.text:
@87_ub Bonjour @87_ub, avez-vous pu profiter du divertissement proposé ? 
Nous espérons que vous avez fait bon voyage et vous remercions pour votre retour !
A bientôt, 
Sandrine

@OkayKarlae Hello Jerrika, we are very sorry for this situation. Can you please contact us by DM with your booking reference and ask for an agent ? My colleagues will be able to assist you. Thank you, Clémence.

@thebigdabowski7 Hello ! 
The flight diverted to Seville due to a medical emergency on board. The flight arrived at SVQ at 18:28 and departed at 20:12 after the passengers were taken care of by the station. 
Have a good day ! 
Anne ✈

@ptdosatron Hi Pamela, we are very sorry for the baggage incident. May you please send us your file reference via DM? We will then be able to transfer your concern to an agent so that it can be taken care of in priority. Thank you in advance.
@Ivan301280 Ivan. Esperamos la información por medio de DM. Con gusto le daremos seguimiento.
@Ivan301280 Hola @Ivan301280 gracias por escribirnos. Si requiere asistencia con algún reporte por demora de equipaje, por favor escríbanos mediante mensaje directo indicando la referencia.

@ptr_yeung Hello Peter, we are very sorry for the delay. Can you please send us your booking reference by DM ? We will then be able to transfer your file to an agent so that it can be taken care of in priority. Thank you in advance, Clémence.
@khloe Hello Khloe, we are sincerely sorry for this situation and we hear your dissatisfaction. We forward your file to an agent who will assist you directly in DM. Thank you, Clémence.

@kimster215 Hello @kimster215,
For now, this is a technical check, not a cancellation. Our teams in LAX are doing their best in order to assist you. We remain at your disposal via DM if needed. Christelle

@alejanoseque Hola Elejota, gracias por tu mensaje y lamentamos la situación que comentas. Para revisar las opciones que podemos entregarte, envíanos por DM el código del Parte de Irregularidad de Equipaje (P.I.R. por sus siglas en inglés. Por ejemplo, CDGAF12345). Estaremos atentos. Saludos.

@khloe Hello @khloe, 
We regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you make a claim to the baggage service? We remain at your disposal if needed. Christelle

@anasaha Hola @anasaha, gracias por contactarnos por este medio. Si necesitas asistencia, por favor escríbenos a través de mensaje interno indicando el código de seguimiento de tu equipaje para poder entregarte más información. Saludos.
@adriiicenteno Hola, AC. Gracias por comunicarte con nosotros por este medio. Comparte con nosotros a través de DM el código PIR de tu expediente por demora en la entrega. Estaremos atentos
@superjourno Hello, we are very sorry for this situation. Can you please contact us by DM with your booking reference ? An agent will be able to assist you. Thank you, Clémence.
@JayCoop32 Hello, we are sorry for the delay. We invite you to contact our customer service so that an agent can help you. We remain at your disposal. Thank you, Clémence.

@Yash02415210 Hello @Yash02415210,
we regret the facts mentioned , which we take very seriously. We invite you to contact our customer service via DM who will get back to you after investigation. Have a nice evening. Christelle
@otichama Hola, Marielena.Gracias por comunicarte con nosotros por este medio. Comparte por medio de DM tu código de reclamación con gusto le daremos seguimiento. Estaremos atentos
